thread.title: UT's defensive struggles especially painful for Strong
thread.title_full: UT's defensive struggles especially painful for Strong | Dallas Morning News

author: Chuck Carlton
title: UT's defensive struggles especially painful for Strong
text:
Charlie Strong made his reputation as one of the nation's top defensive coordinators, which makes Texas' struggles this year even more painful.
"Everything starts with defense," the Texas coach said this week. "As with any team ... you have no chance if you don't play great defense, and right now we're not."
Texas ranks last in the Big 12 -- not exactly a defensive bastion -- in first downs allowed, third-down conversion defense and red-zone defense. Opponents have scored 23 of 25 times on trips inside the Texas 20.
"We've got to get off the field on third down, and we just can't allow the quarterback to just stand in the pocket and air it out," Strong said.
